website_summaries.verdict: Crafters who seek a variety of different shades for projects will definitely want to consider this sampler kit with 2 oz. jars.
pros: Water-based formula cleans easily with soap and water
Easy to create "distressed" look for shabby chic projects
Works on a wide variety of surfaces
Kit includes 9 different shades of chalk paint

customer_reviews.title: Tiny bottles
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful chalk paints! Arrived very quick and packaged great. However I did not realize how small they were at all. It’s only 2fl. Ounces so I suggest using them for a small project vs a big one maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great paint providing excellent coverage. So far I've used it to paint dollar store pumpkins, and the bright orange was covered no problem without priming. Love that I still have a ton of product left- this stuff goes really far. Edit: Almost one year later, the paints have been sitting in my craft cabinet since I painted the pumpkins last Fall. I pulled them out this week, gave them a shake, and painted over an ugly pot for the back of my daughter's toilet, as well as stenciled some crates to hide unsightly refill bottles in my laundry area. This paint keeps beautifully and doesn't dry out. I still have a ton left!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: These chalk paints are great. I mix mine with water so these smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: These chalk paints are great. I mix mine with water so these smaller bottles can get some good use for me.
customer_reviews.author: Justbeachyjade

customer_reviews.title: Great sampler of neutrals, blues and a green
customer_reviews.text: It took a few weeks for these chalk paints to come but it was worth the wait. Previously, I have used a couple of the neutral colors that are included in this set. Having liked the neutrals, I wanted to sample a few more colors. This collection has 5 neutrals 3 blues and 1 green. I just finished painting an orange pumpkin green. It only took one coat. I’m impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia J. Salim

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little sample kit. I’m repurposing some cigar boxes and these paints work really well for that. They apply well and are very nice. I’ve used Annie Sloan and this is somewhat comparable for the price, but I haven’t used it for large scale projects so I cannot speak to that. I recommend for small projects or for testing colors, or detailed painting on furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great sample set it helped me decide on my accent color and I still have plenty left for more projects
customer_reviews.author: Testwithshel

customer_reviews.title: Love it for a variety of crafting uses.
customer_reviews.text: Love it for all my crafting uses. Works well on all types of surfaces- metal, wood, mirrors, rocks, plastic, etc., and plays well with all the other kids in the sandbox such as crackle medium, acrylic paints, watercolor and watercolor pens, accepts glue, and spray on/paint sealers. The colors are beautiful and mixable. I have even mixed them with acrylics and alcohol inks and was very pleased with the results. Keep in mind that when you mix with other paint sources, the integrity of the chalk board effect, may diminish. But if you are like me, these different effects are pleasing to the eye and satisfying results. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: CherylTop Contributor: Quilting

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety of colors
customer_reviews.text: Used this paint for a multimultimedia project. Love the soft colors.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerhawk

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: I love all the colors! It's a very good way to try different colors without spending so much!
customer_reviews.author: Addi

customer_reviews.title: Paint
customer_reviews.text: The picture is very misleading, but I also should’ve read the product size. Either way, the paint is good.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: 8 colors, 9 paints...
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say anything bad about the product. The paints 🎨 are great. I love them & the colors are so pretty. I’m a little disappointed though. I received 9 paints but only 8 colors. I received 2 colors in “grotto” & missing the color nautical. I’m not going through the hassle to return. It’s only one paint. A simple mistake. I was excited to try nautical as blue is a fav color of mine. But other than that, I’d love to order more in the future, if they can stay in stock long enough, lol! They go quick! Great deal. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Trina Peyton

customer_reviews.title: Missing one bottle, but paint itself is good
customer_reviews.text: Description reads 9 bottles, but I only received 8. Parisian Grey is missing. I contacted Amazon through Chat and they gave me a partial refund because the product is no longer available. Fair enough. Aside from that, I've used this paint on the interior walls of a dollhouse, miniature wood furniture, and on canvas painting and have been very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet A. Deckman

customer_reviews.title: Love this chalk paint!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set of two fluid ounce jars for this cheap so that I know what colors I like and what colors I don't like so that I can order bigger jars of them. The only thing I didn't like, when I received the package, is that not all of the lids were screwed on tightly. Thank goodness none of the paints leaked or got all over the box, but the lids should be checked.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger1734

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These paints are super easy to use, dry really fast, and give a really nice finish. I will say the lighter colors require more coats for coverage, Which doesn’t bother me. And I love the colors! I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Annemarie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to using chalk paint. Decided this was a good way to try them out. Color selection is cute. Very farmhouse friendly decor colors.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Silver

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I up cycle and shabby chic furniture for my home side business and I loved the folk art! I ordered this to sample different colors and to my pleasant surprise this stuff works really well! It is full cover on first coat and once wax is applied it’s beautiful. Great value for the amount you spend!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality paint for the price, don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this started paint kid to try on different items around the house, based on reviews. The quality is really bad, it does not apply smoothly and dries faster, which does not allow building coverage. I tried the chalk paint from waverly from Walmart an it is 10x better
customer_reviews.author: anfe27

customer_reviews.title: Great paint and nice colors
customer_reviews.text: Great paint and colors. The small samples are perfect for trying new colors.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to see the colors before purchasing a larger bottle, this set had all the colors I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Nice paint.
customer_reviews.text: I got these paints for craft works. This is my first purchase of chalk paint. They seemed to be okay. The main issue I had we the colors are very close to each other. You had 3 versions of white. I couldn't see spending $10 more for brighter colors though. Guess I might have to though.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Good brand but old paint?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this paint before and loved it however, this paint was old. One bottle (green) was previously opened and seal ripped so the paint was thick and dried out and unsalvageable. I bought this set for a paint party I hosted tonight so we had to substitute some colors with acrylics I had on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: UPSET DRIED UP TRYING TO USE
customer_reviews.text: Paints were dried up for some reason don't know if I can add paint thinner or water would like. Refund but already started using
customer_reviews.author: Holly Hollis

customer_reviews.title: ONLY 8 BOTTLES NOT NINE CAME.
customer_reviews.text: MISSING A BOTTLE.... I HAVE NO IDEA HOW TO TELL SOMEONE. IT WAS THE CASTLE COLOR. help.
customer_reviews.author: Catsroses

customer_reviews.title: Great paints
customer_reviews.text: Being a beginner at chalk painting, I figured I'd give these a try. It comes with great colors and easy to use. I've done two projects so far and I added photos of them. These are only 2 oz bottles but a little goes a long way. This is a great way to sample colors for a larger project.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Goff

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good deal, I used them to paint Mason jars and was able to do several with each container of paint even though they were small.

customer_reviews.title: The size is not very big. Make sure that you are aware that these are just simple sizes
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try these out.. I was disappointed when I opened the box and realized that they were small and not regular size make sure you read the fine print of the size. Other than that it was nice to have a good selection of colors to try out before I purchase a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I purchased this set of colors, most colors are great and have assisted with my up-cycle projects. I've told my friends!!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great paint for signs!
customer_reviews.text: Great paint! This is perfect for sign making. I’ve bought multiple sample packs and some full size from this brand. Don’t hesitate!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have tested but have not fully used this product as yet. So far i like the look. Would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Love this paint
customer_reviews.text: I really love this paint. It dries quickly and has a nice texture. Will definitely be using these a lot.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The colors are very similar. Wish it was a better variety. But they are super easy to use and stay on pretty well.

customer_reviews.title: Chalk paint

customer_reviews.title: Make sure all products is in package

customer_reviews.title: product does not ship well
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the carton all the caps were off the paints. Fortunately the seal is attached very strongly. Unfortunately the seal is attached so strong that I had great difficulty taking it off the open the bottle. Would suggest better caps and a tab on the seal

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors, great coverage.
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors. Just the right size for my wood sign projects. With this paint, a little goes a long way. This is a thick paint that can be watered down to fit your needs. Great opaque coverage with just one coat.

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This paint was a great buy!!...Went a long way! I used both the white and off white full bottles and about 1/2 of the Robbins egg blue as well as 1/4 of the Navy to finish the chair as well as the vanity set. The paint are a bit thick so I did water down a bit at points. I just used a dry brush other than that and a spray bottle with 1/2 vinegar and water mix to blend. Then sanded to distress. Bought Folk Art chalk Wax to set. Was so easy!!

product_meta.title: FolkArt Home Decor Ultra Matte Chalk Finish Acrylic Craft Paint Set Formulated for No-Prep Application Designed for Beginners and Artists, 2 oz Bottles, Top Colors
product_meta.description: Give your furniture, home décor, and more a weathered look with the FolkArt Home Décor Chalk Finish Paint Set. Brush on any of the nine colors in this set for a smooth finish that is easy to distress. With this neutral- toned set you can paint on wood, terra cotta, metal, ceramic, paper, canvas, glass, fabric and more! This paint dries ultra matte for a natural finish that is great for layering. Your décor will have a fresh new look with this easy-to-use and easy to clean up chalk finish paint set.
feature_bullets: This FolkArt Multi-Surface Paint set includes 9 – 2oz. bottles of chalk finish paint in Nautical, Cascade, White Adirondack, Spanish Moss, Grotto, Oatmeal, Parisian Grey, Castle, and Sheepskin.
Easy to layer and distress. No sanding or priming needed
Use on wood, terra cotta, metal, ceramic, paper, canvas, glass and fabric
Water-based, non-toxic, made in the USA

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,111 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
